column1: The readings for 1900 to 1940 were not submitted until the early 1940s on modified forms for other decades.

The readings for 1901 and 1904 were identical, which suggests that the results have been transcribed incorrectly. A comparison with OSWESTRY MOUNTS RESERVOIR clearly suggests 1904 is duplicated from 1901 and so 1904 has been deleted.
Readings between 1918 to 1939 were entered as annual totals only
The 1912 annual total has been amended to match the sum of the monthly readings
January 1941 record is noted as being corrected for snow, the reading has been left in place
January 1955 reading is in brackets with no explanation and has been removed along with the annual total
